            "title": [
              [
                "$ch = curl_init();\n\ncurl_setopt_array($ch, array(\n    CURLOPT_POST => 1,\n    CURLOPT_URL => \"https://api.externalserver.com/upload.php\",\n    CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => 1,\n    CURLINFO_HEADER_OUT => 1,\n    CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => $data\n));\n\n$result = curl_exec($ch);\n\ncurl_close ($ch);"
              ]
            ]
